channel.title: InputStream returning 0 for availability()
channel.description: Hello, This is kind of a p-server question but also a strange one. I open a socket to the server, and i get the InputStream of it, but when I do .availability() it always returns 0. What could cause it?

item.title: InputStream returning 0 for availability()
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

inputStream.available(), and it could be there are no bytes in the buffer. (btw, i dont think private servers send out bytes until they receive them, so send the first packets and see how it goes)

Read full topic
